mapper.insert: insert into review (event_no, member_no, write_date, content, star) value (#{event_no}, #{member_no}, now(), #{content}, #{star})
mapper.select: select r.*, e.img_path, e.name from review r inner join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no inner join event e on r.event_no = e.event_no where m.member_no = #{member_no}
